downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/1/e/b/1eb8177d-f455-4cd0-a5ef-b99ebfcaadc9/Partner Guidance - Hosted Mail Migration to O365 (v1.1).pdf

detailsSection: This document provides guidance to hosted mail partners enabling migration of their installed base to Office 365 (Exchange Online).  It incorporates lessons from previous migrations, outlines recommendations and best practices and incorporates the usage of existing and familiar tools.
detailsSection_file_name: Partner Guidance - Hosted Mail Migration to O365 (v1.1).docx
Partner Guidance - Hosted Mail Migration to O365 (v1.1).pdf
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is an Adobe Reader file. Users who do not have Adobe Reader can download it from Adobe.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
